description:
Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo’s clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring! Will he be able to snag the Flare-Flare Fruit?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaken Sakuretsu! Fukkatsu Meramera no Mi no Chikara
L’explosion du poing ardent. Le pouvoir du Pyro-fruit est de retour !
The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!
Взрыв Огненного Кулака. Сила возрожденного фрукта Мера-Мера
انطلاق قبضة النار! عودة قوّة فاكهة اللّهب!
火拳炸裂! 復活メラメラの実の力
